title: The New York Times Book Review
additional-notes: The Book Review was included in Sunday issues of The New York Times. The Times began filing general renewals for issues from April 1, 1928 onward, and those renewals may cover issues of the Book Review that were included in Sunday issues.  The first issue renewal shown here is the first active renewal we have found specifically for the Book Review.

Contribution renewals listed here were renewals whose records specifically mention the Book Review. There may be additional renewals for contributions to the Book Review that do not specifically mention it.
